name: Half Truck Car Trash ( Car Crushing Simulation game )
name_original: Half Truck Car Trash ( Car Crushing Simulation game )
description: Half Truck Car Trash is one of the most challenging and adrenaline-pumping  games.If you’re looking for some  “Action Factor”, then you’ve come to the right place. This super-fast game has it all - and more! You can crush as many cars as you want and what more you get bonus time to do more of it.Loads of fun! Enjoy!
